entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Plan for Instance Members in `nameof` #67565
    C# 12.0
  • Move BoundInterpolatedString placeholders to the containing BoundCall #67557
  • region cannot be collapsed #67555
  • Reference an Analyzer with dependencies via ProjectReference #67548
  • Implicit index indexer doesn't work in object initializer #67533

Closed

  • Remove IsBlocking properties from CodeRefactoringContext and CodeFixContext #61122
  • [caret placement] Extract Interface #13503
    Backlog
  • `NullReferenceException` in `RefSafetyAnalysis.GetValEscape` #67070
    17.5
  • IDE0051 erroneously triggers for required awaitable/awaiter members #62856
    Backlog
  • No ref safety error reported for switch expression with locals used in switch statement or foreach statement expression #67493
    17.6
  • record ToString Questions and suggestions #67552
  • False-positive for IDE0251 Make member readonly #67531

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67563
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67561
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update LSP package and avoid send workspace/configuration request to client if client doesn't have the ability #67560
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update VB Extract Interface to use GetRelevantNode #67559
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize some SegmentedArrayHelper members for JIT #67558
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Port: "Fix incorrect 'isExplicit' value in CodeFixService #67547" to main #67556
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify logic for lightbulb priority classes #67554
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify DirectorySeparatorChar in PathUtilities #67545
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.7-vs-deps #67544
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.7-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #67542
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67541
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Remove legacy 'IsBlocking' internal flag from code actions #67549
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67543
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use 'DoNot' instead of contraction 'Dont' in symbol names #67550
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Remove descendent node tracking from SyntaxEditor #67314" from 17.6 #67551
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #67513
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Ensure placeholders and locals are registered in RefSafetyAnalysis before escape analysis #67155
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Remove existing sync lightbulb code #67540
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix incorrect 'isExplicit' value in CodeFixService #67547
    Area-IDE
  • Remove support for synchronous lightbulbs #67536
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67546
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [Infra] Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67532
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [Infra] Merge main to release/dev17.6 #67539
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.7-vs-deps #67538
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67537
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix issues with 'fixed size buffer' and 'make method readonly' #67535
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [Infra] Update for 17.6 P3 snap #67534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove code for 'push' diagnostic tagging #67505
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog
  • Avoid applying partial changes when a code fix contains a mix of supported and unsupported actions #67262
    Area-IDE
